com.tweetcrawl.agents.ui

Class CloudImageFrame.CustomPaintComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • com.tweetcrawl.agents.ui.CloudImageFrame.CustomPaintComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    CloudImageFrame

    private class CloudImageFrame.CustomPaintComponent
extends java.awt.Component
    Component used by the CloudImageFrame to contain the word cloud.

        Allows to draw the word cloud of a particular day.

        g2d - the Graphics2D object in which to display the word cloud
